asset_name_translations.en: EDPB Guidelines 4/2019. Data Protection by Design and by Default

description_translations.en: These Guidelines give general guidance on the obligation of Data Protection by Design and by Default (henceforth “DPbDD”) set forth in Article 25 in the GDPR.
description_translations.es: Estas Directrices ofrecen una orientación general sobre la obligación de la Protección de Datos por Diseño y por Defecto (en adelante "DPbDD") establecida en el artículo 25 del GDPR.
description_translations.it: Le presenti Linee guida forniscono indicazioni generali sull'obbligo di protezione dei dati fin dalla progettazione e per impostazione predefinita (di seguito "DPbDD") di cui all'articolo 25 del GDPR.
description_translations.lv: Šīs vadlīnijas sniedz vispārēju ieskatu GDPR 25. pantā izklāstītajās integrētās datu aizsardzības un datu aizsardzības pēc noklusējuma (turpmāk "DPbDD") saistībās.

name_translations.es: Directrices de protección de datos del EDPB
name_translations.it: Linee guida EDPB per la protezione dei dati

regulations_and_standards_translations.en:
• Article 70 (1e) of the Regulation 2016/679/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC], (hereinafter "GDPR")
  • EEA Agreement and in particular to Annex XI and Protocol 37 thereof, as amended by the Decision of the EEA joint Committee No 154/2018 of 6 July 2018,
  • Article 12 and Article 22 of its Rules of Procedure
